## NavSelectors interface

Interface that exposes selectors to the navigation structure

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NavSelectors 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [root](./redux-utils.navselectors.root.md) | <code>string</code> | ID of the (virtual) root item of the navigation |
|  [selectChildren](./redux-utils.navselectors.selectchildren.md) | <code>UnaryFunction&lt;string, Observable&lt;string[]&gt;&gt;</code> | Selects the children of a particular item |
|  [selectParent](./redux-utils.navselectors.selectparent.md) | <code>UnaryFunction&lt;string, Observable&lt;string&gt;&gt;</code> | Selects the parent of a particular item |
